Message - Class in com.qwertovsky.mailer
 
Message(Session) - Constructor for class Message
 
MessageContent - Class in com.qwertovsky.mailer
Message with content, content type, charset , contentTransferEncoding, subject and address 'From:' For example: 
 //simple text message
 MessageContent message = new MessageContent(
        "Message text", "text/plain", "Subject", "utf-8");
 message.setAddressFrom("Company", "sender@company.com", "utf-8");
 
 
 //html message with alternative part
 MessageContent message = new MessageContent(
        "HTML message", "text/html", "Subject", "utf-8");
 message.setAlternativeText("Text message", "utf-8");
 message.setAddressFrom("Company", "sender@company.com", "utf-8");
MessageContent(MessageContent) - Constructor for class MessageContent
Create copy of MessageContent object
MessageContent(File) - Constructor for class MessageContent
Create message from EML file.
MessageContent(InputStream) - Constructor for class MessageContent
Create message from input stream of EML file.
MessageContent(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class MessageContent
Create message from text.
